Comment: As a Canadian, I almost hope he tries. Carney has proven to be pretty cut and dry and has called out bad-faith press questions for what they are in the past. He will also fact-check Trump without a second thought. I would anticipate this meeting to be behind closed doors, though. I don't think Trump wants to be fact-checked in real time by an economist whose first language is English and shares common idioms with the US. Furthermore, it would be to Carney's benefit to be out of the spotlight so that he can be more strategic with interacting with Trump. Flattery is strategically effective against Trump, for example, but would be seen negatively by Canadians.
